hero.title: Hi, I'm Amanda
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Full-Stack Developer with expertise in Node.js, React, JavaScript, Git, HTML, CSS, Clean Architecture, and Test-Driven Development (TDD).

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am a passionate software developer looking for my first opportunity.
about.description: I am passionate about technology because of its transformative power, which improves our lives in countless ways. This passion drives me to constantly seek new learning opportunities. In addition, I spend my free time playing automation games, which reflect my interest in complex systems.
